Create a new service account with the nameÂ pvviewer. Grant this Service account access toÂ listÂ all PersistentVolumes in the cluster by creating an appropriate cluster role calledÂ pvviewer-roleÂ and ClusterRoleBinding calledÂ pvviewer-role-binding.Next, create a pod calledÂ pvviewerÂ with the image:Â redisÂ and serviceAccount:Â pvviewerÂ in the default namespace.

  • ServiceAccount: pvviewer

def show_profit(data):

import csv

def show_profit(data):
    name = data[0] # ì¢…ëª©
    purchase_price = int(data[1]) # ë§¤ì…ê°€
    amount = int(data[2]) # ìˆ˜ëŸ‰

    print(f"{name} {profit} {profit_ratio:.2f}%")
